description: React component UploadPanel.jsx providing UI for file uploads, input validation, and initiation of compliance jobs via the useUploadComplianceJob hook.

methods.name: UploadPanel({ value, onChange, onStarted, disabled })
methods.description: React functional component providing an interface to upload files and trigger compliance jobs.

methods.name: start()
methods.description: Initiates the compliance job creation using selected files and user options.

methods.name: onFile
methods.description: Handles file input changes for different upload fields.

methods.name: onToggleReplace
methods.description: Handles checkbox toggle for replace intention.

ctags.name: UploadPanel
ctags.pattern: /^export default function UploadPanel({ value, onChange, onStarted, disabled }) {$/
